verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called יִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> And Isaac אֶֽל־ <WH413> about יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> and blessed אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיְצַוֵּ֙הוּ֙ <WH6680> him and charged וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> him and said ל֔וֹ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> unto him Thou shalt not take אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

ק֥וּם <WH6965> Arise לֵךְ֙ <WH1980> go פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה אֲרָ֔ם <WH6307> to Padanaram בֵּ֥יתָה <WH1004> to the house בְתוּאֵ֖ל <WH1328> of Bethuel אֲבִ֣י <WH1> father אִמֶּ֑ךָ <WH517> thy mother's וְקַח־ <WH3947> and take לְךָ֤ מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> thee a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> from thence of the daughters לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> of Laban אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH517> thy mother's

וְאֵ֤ל <WH410> And God שַׁדַּי֙ <WH7706> Almighty יְבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> bless אֹֽתְךָ֔ <WH853> וְיַפְרְךָ֖ <WH6509> thee and make thee fruitful וְיַרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7235> and multiply וְהָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> you may become לִקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> thee that thou mayest be a multitude עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> of people

וְיִֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> And give לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> בִּרְכַּ֣ת <WH1293> thee the blessing אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> of Abraham לְךָ֖ וּלְזַרְעֲךָ֣ <WH2233> to thee and to thy seed אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> that לְרִשְׁתְּךָ֙ <WH3423> with thee that thou mayest inherit אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land מְגֻרֶ֔יךָ <WH4033> wherein thou art a stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> which God לְאַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> unto Abraham

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent away יִצְחָק֙ <WH3327> And Isaac אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה אֲרָ֑ם <WH6307> to Padanaram אֶל־ <WH413> to לָבָ֤ן <WH3837> unto Laban בֶּן־ <WH1121> son בְּתוּאֵל֙ <WH1328> of Bethuel הָֽאֲרַמִּ֔י <WH761> the Syrian אֲחִ֣י <WH251> the brother רִבְקָ֔ה <WH7259> of Rebekah אֵ֥ם <WH517> mother יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob's וְעֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> and Esau's

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw עֵשָׂ֗ו <WH6215> When Esau כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בֵרַ֣ךְ <WH1288> had blessed יִצְחָק֮ <WH3327> that Isaac אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹב֒ <WH3290> Jacob וְשִׁלַּ֤ח <WH7971> and sent him away אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה אֲרָ֔ם <WH6307> to Padanaram לָקַֽחַת־ <WH3947> to take ל֥וֹ מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> him a wife בְּבָרֲכ֣וֹ <WH1288> from thence and that as he blessed אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> him he gave him a charge עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> Thou shalt not take אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> obeyed יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> And that Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> about אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> and his mother וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> gone פַּדֶּ֥נָֽה אֲרָֽם׃ <WH6307> to Padanaram

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> seeing עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> And Esau כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רָע֖וֹת <WH7451> not בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> that the daughters כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> pleased יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> Isaac אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> Esau אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשְׁמָעֵ֑אל <WH3458> unto Ishmael וַיִּקַּ֡ח <WH3947> and took אֶֽת־ <WH853> מָחֲלַ֣ת ׀ <WH4258> which he had Mahalath בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <WH3458> of Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> Abraham's אֲח֧וֹת <WH269> the sister נְבָי֛וֹת <WH5032> of Nebajoth עַל־ <WH5921> besides נָשָׁ֖יו <WH802> unto the wives ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to be his wife ס
וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob מִבְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> from Beersheba וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went חָרָֽנָה׃ <WH2771> toward Haran

וַיִּפְגַּ֨ע <WH6293> And he lighted בַּמָּק֜וֹם <WH4725> upon a certain place וַיָּ֤לֶן <WH3885> and tarried there all night שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there כִּי־ <WH3588> because בָ֣א <WH935> was set הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> because the sun וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> and he took מֵאַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> of the stones הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> of that place וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <WH7760> and put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֑יו <WH4763> [them for] his pillows וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> to sleep בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> in that place הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> He

וַֽיַּחֲלֹ֗ם <WH2492> And he dreamed וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold סֻלָּם֙ <WH5551> and behold a ladder מֻצָּ֣ב <WH5324> set up אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> on the earth וְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> and the top of it מַגִּ֣יעַ <WH5060> reached הַשָּׁמָ֑יְמָה <WH8064> to heaven וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> and behold the angels אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God עֹלִ֥ים <WH5927> ascending וְיֹרְדִ֖ים <WH3381> and descending בּֽוֹ׃

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And behold the LORD נִצָּ֣ב <WH5324> stood עָלָיו֮ <WH5921> above וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> above it and said אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> God אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> of Abraham אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father וֵאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> and the God יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> of Isaac הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you שֹׁכֵ֣ב <WH7901> whereon thou liest עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> above לְךָ֥ אֶתְּנֶ֖נָּה <WH5414> to thee will I give it וּלְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <WH2233> and to thy seed

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become זַרְעֲךָ֙ <WH2233> And thy seed כַּעֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> shall be as the dust הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וּפָרַצְתָּ֛ <WH6555> and thou shalt spread abroad יָ֥מָּה <WH3220> to the west וָקֵ֖דְמָה <WH6924> and to the east וְצָפֹ֣נָה <WH6828> and to the north וָנֶ֑גְבָּה <WH5045> and to the south וְנִבְרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> be blessed בְךָ֛ כָּל־ <WH3605> shall all מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> shall all the families הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> of the earth וּבְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <WH2233> and in thee and in thy seed

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I עִמָּ֗ךְ <WH5973> you וּשְׁמַרְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH8104> And behold I [am] with thee and will keep בְּכֹ֣ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> thee in all [places] whither תֵּלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> go וַהֲשִׁ֣בֹתִ֔יךָ <WH7725> and will bring thee again אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> into this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise כִּ֚י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶֽעֱזָבְךָ֔ <WH5800> for I will not leave עַ֚ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> thee until אִם־ <WH518> lo עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> I have done אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> [that] which I have spoken לָֽךְ׃

וַיִּיקַ֣ץ <WH3364> awaked יַעֲקֹב֮ <WH3290> And Jacob מִשְּׁנָתוֹ֒ <WH8142> out of his sleep וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and he said אָכֵן֙ <WH403> Surely יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> is יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH3045> and I knew

וַיִּירָא֙ <WH3372> And he was afraid וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said מַה־ <WH4100> How נּוֹרָ֖א <WH3372> How dreadful הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> [is] this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> is this אֵ֣ין <WH369> is none זֶ֗ה <WH2088> This כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> this [is] none other but the house אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> and this שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> and this [is] the gate הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of heaven

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> rose up early יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And Jacob בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> the stone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> that he had put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֔יו <WH4763> [for] his pillows וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and set it up אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> מַצֵּבָ֑ה <WH4676> [for] a pillar וַיִּצֹ֥ק <WH3332> and poured שֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> oil עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <WH7218> upon the top of it

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> And he called אֶת־ <WH853> שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> Bethel וְאוּלָ֛ם <WH199> but ל֥וּז <WH3870> [was called] Luz שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of that city לָרִאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> at the first

וַיִּדַּ֥ר <WH5087> vowed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob נֶ֣דֶר <WH5088> a vow לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> If יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> If God עִמָּדִ֗י <WH5978> me וּשְׁמָרַ֙נִי֙ <WH8104> will be with me and will keep me בַּדֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> in this way הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> that I go וְנָֽתַן־ <WH5414> and will give לִ֥י לֶ֛חֶם <WH3899> me bread לֶאֱכֹ֖ל <WH398> to eat וּבֶ֥גֶד <WH899> and raiment לִלְבֹּֽשׁ׃ <WH3847> to put on

וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י <WH7725> So that I come again בְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> in peace אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑י <WH1> to my father's וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> then יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> then shall the LORD לִ֖י לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> be my God

וְהָאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> And this stone הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שַׂ֙מְתִּי֙ <WH7760> which I have set מַצֵּבָ֔ה <WH4676> [for] a pillar יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> shall be God's וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and of all that thou shalt give לִ֔י עַשֵּׂ֖ר <WH6237> me I will surely אֲעַשְּׂרֶ֥נּוּ <WH6237> give the tenth לָֽךְ׃
